message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe is worth a lot to you. I'm willing to let it go for $11,500.  It's a great deal, considering what it's worth to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a great deal for you considering the value you place on this product.  Let's find a way to make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,250?
